lead_paragraph: Some in political circles still feel Mr. Trump could decline to be president if elected. “I’ll let you know how I feel about it after it happens,” he told us.

byline.contributor: Alexander Burns and Maggie Haberman contributed reporting.

headline.print_headline: Would Trump Quit After Winning the Election? He Doesn’t Rule It Out
headline.main: Would Donald Trump Quit if He Wins the Election? He Doesn’t Rule It Out

snippet: Some in political circles still feel Mr. Trump could decline to be president if elected. “I’ll let you know how I feel about it after it happens,” he told us....
abstract: Donald J Trump offers coy answer to question of whether he may quit if elected president, providing fodder for those who suspect he is more interested in winning presidency than serving as president.
